name: American Airlines B777-300ER: Scenic Approach and Landing at London Heathrow (with ATC)
description:
Approach and landing into London Heathrow runway 27L, onboard American Airlines Boeing 777-300ER N727AN, operating flight AA136 from Los Angeles.

The video commences with us in the hold at Ockham, before we are cleared to continue our approach towards Central London, turning to get a beautiful view of London on our approach to runway 27L.

Airline:  American Airlines
Flight:  AA136
Aircraft:  Boeing 777-300ER N727AN
From:  Los Angeles (LAX)
To:  London Heathrow (LHR)
Departure:  20:17
Arrival:  14:12*
Flight Time:  09:55:
Seat:  31L

Filmed from seat 31L (well, the window behind this row as there is no window on this exit row :-))

***PLEASE SUBSCRIBE, LIKE, COMMENT, AND FOLLOW ME ON FACEBOOK, TWITTER, GOOGLE+ AND INSTAGRAM!!***

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
